title: Bug 114905 - Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report parameter with Display type set to List Box.
2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc" and set "aa" as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa" and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.

OB: No default value is set.
EB: "aaa" should be the default value.
SR: Repeating step 4 should show "aaa" as the default value.
